title: Hangs up while i talk to people cant hear the person on the other end half the time
content:
I tried restarting the phone 
I tried reconnecting to network 

But it's a useless price of shit 
Takes a long time to load everything
Hangs up in the middle of a conversation that the line cuts off 90 percent of the time     a $dollar phone work better than this pixel three 
Very Dissatisfied
